title: The Weathering, Dawn of the Apocalypse
description: The Weathering is an apocalyptic novel about destruction, evil, and survival. If everyone on earth started killing each other there would only be the ones fighting to survive and those that fought for the kill. The Weathering is a story where real life comes back to devour humanity for their own evils.  A group of friends from the wealthiest families call themselves The Weathering. They have got what they want their entire lives. The Weathering has sought adventures to take their minds off the boredom of life. When the Weathering fall bored they decide to take their excitement to extreme. They decide to kill and eat someone and see if they can get away with it.  Years pass and Chrystal, one of The Weathering followers, has decided to turn her life around. Crystal moves to a new town with new friends, new careers, and a new life. Crystal promised to keep the murder a secret or face destruction from the Weathering. Crystal writes about the murder on her blog and how easy it would be to kill someone if everyone was doing it at the same time.  All of a sudden her blog and ideas start go viral and take life as people start to commit murders, terrorist attacks, and global destruction the way she wrote in her blog. People can either do the evil they want to get away with or defend their lives from the evil of the world.  Crystal is caught in the middle of a world in complete anarchy as The Weathering hunts her down to punish her for her decision to leave them and tell their secretes. Will The Weathering find her, kill her, and will she make it out of the complete destruction of all humanity?
author: Joseph McGinnis
